import './style.css' import * as React from "react"; import Images from '../../assets/book.jpg' import Header from "../../components/Header"; import Main from "../../components/Main"; import Container from "../../components/Container"; import Footer from "../../components/Footer"; import api from '../../services/api'; export default function RegisterBks () { const [boks, setBoks] = React.useState([]) const [input, setInput] = React.useState({ title: '', textarea: '' }) const handleChange = (event) => { setInput ({ ...input, [event.target.title]: event.target.textarea }) } const handleSubmit = async () => { event.preventDefault() const response = await api.post('/books', { id: new Date().getTime(), title: input.title, description: input.textarea }) } return(
